name: Herald

sources.name: Pathfinder #160: Assault on Hunting Lodge Seven

link.name: Pathfinder #160: Assault on Hunting Lodge Seven pg. 85
link.alt: Pathfinder #160: Assault on Hunting Lodge Seven pg. 85

text: Nearly all deities have a specific representative known as a herald; heralds are as diverse in their appearances and abilities as the gods themselves. A creature with the herald type is always unique.
